full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RGYAL PO'I GSOL MCHOD DREGS PA'I RE BA SKONG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @014A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI BLO GROS KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA'I DGE SLONG DKON MCHOG TSUL KHRIMS KYIS GRONG CHOG PA RNAMS KYI THUGS BZHED BSKONG BA'I SLAD DU BRI DGOS BSKUL BAR RTEN, SNYIGS DUS KI MTHA' LA SLEB PAS RGYAL PO'I GNOD PA COD PA'I 'DUS 'DIR 'GA' ZHIG LA PHAN PA'ANG SRID DAM SNYAM PAS RGYAL PO'I MDOS GZHUNG SOGS KHUNGS THUB RNAMS KYI DON DANG MI 'GAL BAR BSGRIGS PA PO NI DHARMA SVA MI WAGINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN NO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA RNAMS NGA RGYAL DANG ZHI SDANG GIS BSKUL BA'I GNOD BYED KYI 'CHAR SGO SNA TSOGS LA THAR PAR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE LEGS 'PHEL BRKA SHIS,, ,,)
author_simple: DHARMA SVA MI WAGINDRA PA tU SIDDHI'I MING CAN,
